  • Are you kidding me? No, you're not a radio receiver, you're sick.

    Living, whistle, call and other sounds in the ears can be symptoms of a number of pathologies.

  • One cup of cholesterol grew up. What's the most harmful way to make coffee?

    It is possible to make delicious and aromatic coffee at once in a coffee machine, a gay coffee car, a turkey, a French-press and a filter-packet. But some ways are considered more harmful and others are less.

    07.02.2024
  • IKEA, which departed from Russia, extended the right to a trademark in Rospatente until 2033

    IKEA has extended the registration of its trademark in Rospatente, which will belong to it until mid-2033. Three more trademarks are still in question.

    07.02.2024
  • Central Bank found out who's most likely to be a fraud. And they're not retired.

    In the Central Bank of Russia, the stereotyping has been refuted by the stereotyping of pensioners, which is the most common practice for fraudsters. Cybermans suffer more from women aged 25 to 44.

    07.02.2024
  • Back to indexation. Jurist warned of the risk of temporary dismissal of employed retirees

    The scheme whereby active retirees are resigned and then reassigned to the same work, with the Sozfund counting them on payments, is risky.

    07.02.2024
  • In Russia, it can be officially allowed to eat food before payment is made.

    A bill had been introduced in the State of the Russian Federation to allow the use of products in shops to be paid. The document appeared in the legislative system.

    07.02.2024
  • The situation is alarming. In Len oblasts, control of non-conductions will be strengthened

    As reported in the official Telegram Canal of the Government of Len Regioni on 7 February, a meeting was held with the public service and the poultry leaders to ensure the sustainability of the poultry. Prevention of bird flu was discussed in particular.

    07.02.2024

    If the collectors call those who have not been listed in the credit contract, this is a hooligan action that can be written to the police or the FSSP.

    07.02.2024
  • In Len regions, 119 public spaces will benefit this year. We already know what and when

    This year, 119 public spaces will benefit from the Zille and Urban Environment project in the region. Half of the facilities have been identified by contractors, and the remaining bids are under way.

    07.02.2024
  • Global heating. The Kronstadt dam will prepare for the rise of the ocean level

    Specialists will learn how the Kronstadt dam will manage the rise of the oceans. This will provide an opportunity to prepare it for possible catalogues.

  • It's all in "Honour." Kingiseppa is detained for unreal seizures of the police weapons room.

    A man was sent to the cell, urging the police. He is suspected of having been falsely reported on terrorism in the village of the Kingisep region of Len regions.

    07.02.2024
  • The people heard. Roads repair 8 kilometres from Repino towards Simagino

    The regional road from Repino to Simagino in the Len regional region will be repaired in the summer. On an updated track, the drivers will be able to travel to the Scandinavia side, as well as the Greengora and Primor Highway.

    07.02.2024
  • “Inexplicable, but fact”. In January, a record number of people lost in Len regions and Petersburg

    Nearly three hundred applications were received in January by the LizaAllert search team. For Petersburg and Leningrad, this is the largest number of searches for all the Yankees since 2011.

    07.02.2024
  • The RWD prohibits the planting of animals without an electric master.

    The RCD is planning to extend the ban on untrained animals and electricity. The Deputy Director of the RCD, Ivan Kosnikov, said that.

    07.02.2024
  • Helsinki Airport will weigh passengers

    Soomi's main airline has decided to collect data on the average weight of clients and their manual storage when they leave the capital airport.

    07.02.2024
  • The doctor from Kirish Hospital will tell me how the hospital was paid for the money.

    The case of the algae therapist from the Kirish district of Leningrad province was brought to court.

    07.02.2024
